metadata.disclaimer: Based on publicly available crosswalks and expert analysis. Validate with qualified assessors for compliance/audit use.

clauses.title: Security management system
clauses.rationale: PM-1 security program; PM-2 roles; PM-3 resources; PM-9 risk strategy.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 requires IACS-specific security management system integrated with safety management. SP 800-53 covers information security management but OT/ICS-specific integration with safety management is not addressed.

clauses.title: Security risk assessment
clauses.rationale: RA family covers risk assessment comprehensively.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 requires OT-specific risk assessment considering safety impacts, zone/conduit models, and SIL/SL targets. SP 800-53 risk assessment is comprehensive but lacks ICS/OT-specific risk methodology.

clauses.title: Addressing risk with the security management system
clauses.rationale: PM-9 risk management strategy; CA-5 POA&M; RA-3 risk response.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 risk treatment includes safety impact analysis and OT-specific countermeasures. SP 800-53 covers risk treatment but OT safety integration is absent.

clauses.title: Human user identification and authentication
clauses.rationale: IA-2 identification and authentication; IA-5 authenticator management; IA-8 non-organizational users.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 addresses ICS-specific authentication (operator stations, HMI). SP 800-53 covers authentication generally.

clauses.title: Software process and device identification and authentication
clauses.rationale: IA-3 device identification; IA-9 service identification.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 addresses ICS device authentication (PLCs, RTUs, IEDs). SP 800-53 covers device authentication but ICS protocol-specific authentication (e.g., Modbus, DNP3) not addressed.

clauses.title: Account management
clauses.rationale: AC-2 account management; AC-5 separation of duties; AC-6 least privilege.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap for this requirement.

clauses.title: Authenticator management
clauses.rationale: IA-5 authenticator management with password enhancements.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 considers ICS constraints (shared accounts in control rooms, emergency access). SP 800-53 doesn't address operational technology authentication constraints.

clauses.title: Strength of password-based authentication
clauses.rationale: IA-5(1) directly covers password strength requirements.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Authorization enforcement
clauses.rationale: AC-3 access enforcement; AC-4 information flow; AC-6 least privilege.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Mobile code
clauses.rationale: SC-18 mobile code restrictions.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 addresses mobile code in ICS context (ActiveX on HMI stations).

clauses.title: Auditable events
clauses.rationale: AU-2 auditable events; AU-3 content; AU-12 audit generation.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 specifies ICS-relevant audit events (setpoint changes, mode changes, safety system activation). SP 800-53 covers audit generally.

clauses.title: Audit storage capacity
clauses.rationale: AU-4 audit log storage capacity; AU-5 response to audit processing failures.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Timestamps
clauses.rationale: AU-8 timestamps and synchronization.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 considers ICS time synchronization (IEC 61850, PTP).

clauses.title: Communication integrity
clauses.rationale: SC-8 transmission integrity; SI-7 software/firmware integrity.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 addresses ICS communication integrity (process variable integrity). SP 800-53 covers generally.

clauses.title: Software and information integrity
clauses.rationale: SI-7 software and firmware integrity verification.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 addresses ICS firmware/software integrity (PLC programs, configuration files).

clauses.title: Input validation
clauses.rationale: SI-10 information input validation.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 addresses ICS-specific input validation (engineering workstation inputs, setpoint ranges).

clauses.title: Information confidentiality
clauses.rationale: SC-28 data at rest; SC-8 data in transit; AC-3 access enforcement.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 considers ICS-specific confidentiality (process recipes, control algorithms).

clauses.title: Network segmentation
clauses.rationale: SC-7 boundary protection; SC-32 system partitioning; AC-4 information flow.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 uses zones and conduits model for ICS network segmentation. SP 800-53 covers network segmentation but ICS-specific zone/conduit architecture not addressed.

clauses.title: Zone boundary protection
clauses.rationale: SC-7 boundary protection with enhancements.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 zone boundaries include ICS-specific considerations (data historians, DMZ between IT/OT). SP 800-53 boundary controls apply but ICS DMZ architecture not specific.

clauses.title: Audit log accessibility
clauses.rationale: AU-9 protection of audit information; AU-6 audit review.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 considers ICS audit log access from safety perspective.

clauses.title: Continuous monitoring
clauses.rationale: CA-7 continuous monitoring; SI-4 system monitoring.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 addresses ICS-specific monitoring (process variable anomalies, protocol anomalies). SP 800-53 covers monitoring generally but ICS protocol monitoring not addressed.

clauses.title: Denial of service protection
clauses.rationale: SC-5 denial of service protection.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 addresses availability of safety functions. SP 800-53 covers DoS but safety function availability priority not addressed.

clauses.title: Resource management
clauses.rationale: AU-4 storage capacity; SC-5 availability; CP-2 contingency planning.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 addresses ICS resource management for deterministic real-time operation. SP 800-53 doesn't address real-time operational constraints.

clauses.title: Control system backup
clauses.rationale: CP-9 backup; CP-6 alternate storage; CP-10 recovery.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 addresses ICS-specific backup (PLC programs, HMI configurations, historian data). SP 800-53 covers backup generally but ICS-specific backup requirements not detailed.

clauses.title: Control system recovery and reconstitution
clauses.rationale: CP-10 system recovery; IR-4 incident handling.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 addresses safe-state recovery and graceful degradation for control systems. SP 800-53 covers recovery but ICS safe-state concepts not addressed.

clauses.title: Network and security configuration settings
clauses.rationale: CM-2 baselines; CM-6 settings; CM-7 least functionality.
clauses.gaps: Minor: IEC 62443 addresses ICS-specific configuration (PLC hardening, SCADA server configuration).

clauses.title: Least functionality
clauses.rationale: CM-7 least functionality.
clauses.gaps: IEC 62443 applies least functionality to ICS components (disable unused protocols on PLCs). SP 800-53 covers generally but ICS-specific protocol considerations not detailed.
